verses.verse: And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> in his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>, and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> was with <S%H1431>him<s%>, and magnified him <S%H4605>exceedingly<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, and to the <S%H8199>judges<s%>, and to every <S%H7218>prince<s%> in all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses.

So <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, and all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> with <S%H3212>him<s%>, went to the high <S%H1116>place<s%> that was at <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>; for there was the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

But <S%H61><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H1732>David<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H7157>Kiriath-jearim<s%> to the place that <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for <S%H5186>it<s%>; for he had pitched a <S%H168>tent<s%> for it at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%>, that <S%H1212>Bezalel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H221>Uri<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur<s%>, had <S%H6213>made<s%>, was <S%H7760>there<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> and the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> sought unto <S%H1875>it<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> thither to the <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, which was at the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%> upon it.
In that <S%H3915>night<s%> did <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> unto <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7592>him<s%>, Ask what I shall give <S%H5414>thee<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>, Thou hast <S%H6213>showed<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, and hast made me king in his <S%H4427>stead<s%>.

Now <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H430>God<s%>, let thy <S%H1697>promise<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> be <S%H539>established<s%>; for thou hast made me <S%H4427>king<s%> over a <S%H5971>people<s%> like the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> in <S%H7227>multitude<s%>.

Give <S%H5414><s%> me now <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4093>knowledge<s%>, that I may go <S%H3318>out<s%> and come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%>; for who can <S%H8199>judge<s%> this thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, that is so <S%H1419>great<s%>?

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, Because this was in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and thou hast not <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%>, <S%H5233>wealth<s%>, or <S%H3519>honor<s%>, nor the <S%H5315>life<s%> of them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7592>thee<s%>, neither yet hast asked <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>life<s%>; but hast <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4093>knowledge<s%> for <S%H8199>thyself<s%>, that thou mayest judge my <S%H5971>people<s%>, over whom I have made thee <S%H4427>king<s%>:

wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and <S%H4093>knowledge<s%> is <S%H5414>granted<s%> unto <S%H5414>thee<s%>; and I will give thee <S%H6239>riches<s%>, and <S%H5233>wealth<s%>, and <S%H3519>honor<s%>, such as none of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> have had that have been <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H310>thee<s%>; neither shall there any after thee have the like.

So <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from the high <S%H1116>place<s%> that was at <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>, from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>: and he had a <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, that he <S%H3240>placed<s%> in the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and with the <S%H4428>king<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> to be in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> as <S%H68>stones<s%>, and <S%H730>cedars<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> he to be as the <S%H8256>sycomore-trees<s%> that are in the <S%H8219>lowland<s%>, for <S%H7230>abundance<s%>.

And the <S%H5483>horses<s%> which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had were <S%H4161>brought<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5503>merchants<s%> <S%H3947>received<s%> them in <S%H4723>droves<s%>, each drove at a <S%H4242>price<s%>.

And they fetched <S%H5927>up<s%> and brought <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> a <S%H4818>chariot<s%> for <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and a <S%H5483>horse<s%> for a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>: and so for all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>, did they bring them <S%H3318>out<s%> by their <S%H3027>means<s%>.
